column9: Our pizzas tasted ok but the crust was not crisp and the centers were very soggy. They seemed to take awhile to cook so I was surprised when they arrived undercooked. We had a cheese pizza and a pepperoni pizza.

The staff were very kind the pizza came quickly and it tasted amazing I had a chip pizza and it had ham on it and it did not taste funky or anything. But it was very had to eat by yourself! there is a place...More

Great value standard Swedish pizza place. About as cheap a filling meal as you can get outside of falafel rolls. Situated just a stones throw from the train station, this place is perfect for those who arrive late from a flight or long distance train....More

column7: Greasy, too much salt but still pretty tasty
column9:
This is what most swedes think about when they hear "pizza". It's greasy, very salty and has cheap low-quality ingredients. Everything comes out of a can. Hygiene seems low and service is not very good. 

Sometimes this is what you want though, especially after a...More

Being a person who loves both Pizza and Kebab, I just have to write a review about Pizzeria Avesta. It is by far my most favourite Pizza and Kebab place in Lund.

I would either recommend the Kebab Pizza Special, or Lunda Special (both very...More

Best kebab meat in Lund, no joke. The restaurant doesnt look line a 5 star restaurant but the people are nice amd you get good value for the bucks, specially compared to other pizza places near Lund central

column7: Thank you thank you thank you!
column9:
Arriving late evening from a day travelling we found this place. The door was shutting and we had no cash.... The owner guided us to the cashpoint & stayed open!

good value, large family size pizza, nice owners, quick service, recommended and judging by the business, a popular place
great kebabpizza and delicious pizzasalad. Not the cosiest place, but still worth visiting. Friendly staff and good prizes.
The pizza is really great. It looks like a normal "take away" pizza place but the pizza are like a gourmé pizza.
